events.name: #DataDrivenSG Hackathon Singapore - Day 3: Data Girls Workshop
events.description: This is day 3 of a 3-day event hosted by Keboola and Coding Girls and is being announced on behalf of our community member. The Data Girls workshop is aimed towards female individuals with entry-level experience, please refer to business track and hackathon on days 1 and 2 for a more professional focus. Title: #DataDrivenSG Data Girls Workshop Singapore Abstract:Free event - as part of our open data hackathon effort, we are inviting you (sorry boys) to an entry level, very hands on workshop for girls who are keen to get into world of data analysis. This workshop is specifically designed for women to take part in what is mostly men dominated industry and it is organized in cooperation with Coding Girls. For more information, visit www.Codingirls.org You will be guided by our senior instructors and will get to work on very interesting data problems.No prerequisites needed, all you need i open mind and enthusiasm!  — Women only workshop (sorry boys!)— Combination of data theory and hands-on workshop— Analytics Foundation— Registration spots are limited to 50!  Join our unique Analytics crash course. Learn from the best in field, for free and hands on rather than class room style. Start now and before you know it, you will be rocking our hackathons too! Agenda:10:00AM to 1:00PM - Workshop part 11:00PM to 2:00PM - Lunch2:00PM to 6:00PM - Workshop part 2 *For huge interest, we are going to keep accepting RSVPs, but will send out questionaires in next few days to qualify participants, to make sure they are good fit for the event and everyone participating has fun.* Learn more about the #DataDriven Hackathon Singapore here: http://www.datadriven.sg/hackathon Register for Data Girls Workshop at: https://www.eventbrite.com.au/e/datadrivensg-datagirls-free-workshop-by-keboola-codinggirls-tickets-27796185138 We are promoting this event because it aligns with our group interests. For deeper engagement with Apache Apex - follow ApacheApex, presentations, recordings, download (community, sandbox), Apache Apex releases, docs
events.location: The Hangar by NUS Enterprise, 21 Heng Mui Keng Terrace, Singapore
events.group_name: Apache Apex Next Gen Native Hadoop Big Data, Singapore
